content:
In this dataset, people are given rules of thumb, such as "You should be accepting of other people's bodies." People then rate the rule of thumb as to how much of the world population they think would agree with that rule of thumb. 4 means "universal". 3 means "common". 2 means "controversial". 1 means "occasional". 0 means "almost no one".

Examples from the dataset (there may not be any):Examples from the dataset (there may not be any)
Example 1:
Text: You shouldn't play your music really loudly because it's rude and annoying.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It's good to show solidarity with family members in the face of adversity.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 3:
Text: It's expected that families will not get along well with their in-laws.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 4:
Text: It's nice to represent change in your generation.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 5:
Text: It is common for there to be conflicts with your in-laws.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's wrong for a parent to do things to make their children loose respect of them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: You shouldn't rat out other people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's not okay to refuse the food someone cooks for you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: You shouldn't date a bad partner.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 10:
Text: It's normal for married couples to have sexual relations.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 11:
Text: You shouldn't be crazy about things.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 12:
Text: It's expected you get into a fight if you're being racist around people
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: It's bad to make big purchases behind your significant other's back.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 14:
Text: It's okay to show your disgruntlement with what someone does.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's wrong for partners to lie to each other.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 16:
Text: You shouldn't judge a whole race of people by the actions of a few people.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 17:
Text: Adults are expected to bathe daily.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It's understandable to be uncomfortable with people that are different than you.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 19:
Text: It's wrong to not understand sometimes peoples situation isn't the best.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It's good to avoid disturbing animals in the wild.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 21:
Text: It's good to have something in your life that you love with every fiber of your being.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 22:
Text: You don't owe a partner an explanation of past relationships.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It's good to get a job after high school for a while to learn some responsibility.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 24:
Text: If you are uncomfortable with your partner feeding your kids, you should not let your partner watch your children.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 25:
Text: Not everyone wants their images on social media, so you should respect it if they ask you not to share them.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 26:
Text: You should care about your siblings.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 27:
Text: It is wrong to take video games too seriously.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 28:
Text: People should follow the rules.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: You should be accepting of having a half-sibling
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: You should never do anything that may cause your children to despise you.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Target Example:
Text: You should treat employees well
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer and nothing else.
